content: I share the sentiment. For the first PC I chaired, I used easy chair. Ever since, I have been using Shai Halevi's software!
author: omereingold

content: Another annoying thing about EasyChair is that as a reviewer, it takes me about 10 minutes to figure out how to accept/decline a review request. First I need to log in to EasyChair (no link provided in the email!), then figure out what my username/password is (why can't it remember me?), then navigate to the right conference (there are about 20 listed there for me), then navigate to the submission I was asked about (often 2 or 3...), and then accept/decline the invitation. I would then have to repeat the process when times comes to enter my report. With any other system I know, accepting a review is as easy as clicking on a link.
author: Oded
